work.name: Xiaomi
work.skills: Python, PyTorch, Transformers, Neo4j, RESTful APIs
highlights: Built the first large-scale Chinese commonsense knowledge graph for multi-turn dialogue systems to enhance contextual response diversity in production chatbots.
Translated and localized the ATOMIC dataset into Chinese; curated a 200K+ multi-turn daily conversation corpus for dialogue training and evaluation.
Integrated commonsense reasoning into conversational AI systems used in commercial voice assistants through cross-functional collaboration.

work.name: National Language Resource Monitoring Center
work.skills: TensorFlow, BERT, Flask, MySQL, Cloud-based APIs
highlights: Redefined 26-key mobile keyboard boundaries to reduce false touches, improving field-test typing accuracy by 15%.
Developed a multi-task span-prediction model combining syntactic and semantic supervision, improving SRL F1 by 4.6%.
Authored a technical report on personalized cloud-based text error correction leveraging contextual modeling of user input.
